name: Jackpot Universe
description: Jackpot Universe is a battlefield pitting "Pot Protectors" against those who are brave enough to take their chance at being the person crowned champion, walking away with a large sum of money all to themselves. Should the Pot Protectors fulfill their duty until the Jackpot has reached it's max capacity, they will reward the entire community with a buyback of half of the BB Jackpot balance with which the bought back supply will be burned, providing an ever-growing token price. But this is only the beginning of the opportunity... Which side will you choose? Our ecosystem is powered by 7 seperate and unique smart contracts running simultaneously to give holders, players, and those who enjoy watching a non-stop battle between thousands of people, a completely new experience in the crypto space.
